t:
The movie on the TV cut to an emergency broadcast warning people to not look at the moon. The news channels reported about the mass hysteria going around the hemisphere.
Nevertheless, I looked up at the moon and realized that it was all a joke. There's nothing wrong with the moon.

 The moon is red and I am happy.
c:
The moon is red and I am happy.



#moon #red #happy
#hysteria #emergency #broadcast #hemisphere #curiosity
